heading: HR01739
0: A RESOLUTION ENTREATING THE SUPREME COURT FOR AN UPDATE ON THE MAY 21, 2008 PETITION URGING THE SUPREME COURT TO STRIKE DOWN AS UNCONSTITUTIONAL THE JOINT MARINE SEISMIC UNDERTAKING BETWEEN THE PHILIPPINES, CHINA, AND VIETNAM AND APPEAL FOR THE EXPEDITIOUS RESOLUTION OF THE SAME PETITION TO SETTLE DOUBTS OVER THE UNCONSTITUTIONALITY OF A JOINT MARINE EXPLORATION OVER PHILIPPINE WATERS
status: Pending with the Committee on JUSTICE since 2018-03-05
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR01739
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION ENTREATING THE SUPREME COURT FOR AN UPDATE ON THE MAY 21, 2008 PETITION URGING THE SUPREME COURT TO STRIKE DOWN AS UNCONSTITUTIONAL THE JOINT MARINE SEISMIC UNDERTAKING BETWEEN THE PHILIPPINES, CHINA, AND VIETNAM AND APPEAL FOR THE EXPEDITIOUS RESOLUTION OF THE SAME PETITION TO SETTLE DOUBTS OVER THE UNCONSTITUTIONALITY OF A JOINT MARINE EXPLORATION OVER PHILIPPINE WATERS
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ALEJANO, GARY C.
DATE FILED : 2018-02-27
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON JUSTICE ON 2018-03-05
